output_list.reason: The 'transfer' function does not check for integer overflow, allowing users to set the balance of any user to any value, leading to a denial of service.
The 'transferFrom' function does not check for integer overflow, allowing users to transfer tokens to any user, leading to a denial of service.
The 'approve' function allows the owner to approve any spender for any amount, without any checks, leading to misuse.
The 'increaseApproval' function allows the owner to increase the allowance of any spender by any amount, without any checks, leading to misuse.
The 'decreaseApproval' function allows the owner to decrease the allowance of any spender by any amount, without any checks, leading to misuse.
